A streamlined, client-friendly view powered by the VMX Pro engine.
All-in Grand Total Location + Typology Land + Build PDF / Client Pack

Fast Start (2 minutes)

  1. Enter Client Name + Project Name (used on PDFs/exports).
  2. Set Area (sq ft) and select a Tier (Select / Reserve / Signature / Legacy).
  3. Choose Location (automatic multiplier) and Typology (site condition).
  4. Add Land Acquisition Cost if you want a true all-in total.
  5. Review the Grand Total Project Cost and the headline category split.
Tip: Use Compare Mode to show Scenario B and quickly communicate the delta.

What Lite shows (and hides)

  • Shows: totals, category allocation, key drivers, and exports.
  • Hides: band-by-band row editing, guardrail diagnostics, admin tools.
If you need deeper tuning or compliance checks, click Open VMX Pro (professional-only workflow).

Exports

  • Export PDF Report for a client-ready snapshot.
  • Export Client Pack (.zip) to bundle PDF + images for downstream teams.

End of Lite guide.
